code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with mild occasional lightheadedness x 6 weeks. pt also complains of mild spells of vertigo, mild ringing in the ears, Heart. he is a 45 yr old white male. he denies smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 75 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 145, DiastolicBP 93, Respiration 15, Heart = 2/6 systolic murmur at base of heart, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = no edema or clubbing, Heart = normal S1, S2, RRR a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid panel.

Value.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

content2.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

td.content: s:patient describes recurrent mild deterioration of eye sight over the past month. The pt reports mild problem with seeing at night. patient is a 45 year old white male. he denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use o:Height 76 in, Weight 145 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

content2.Unmatched: he denies ever using cigarettes denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:patient presents with mild deterioration of eye sight. he has history of mild problem with seeing at night. patient is a 45 year old M. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 75 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 141, DiastolicBP 91, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
